title: Simple
description: SIMPLE’S LIFE is a painful nightmare.A huge bear of a man, but with the heart and mind of an innocent child, he suffers terrible abuse from his vicious and uncaring backwoods family.Together with his half-sister Leanne, they are hunted like wild animals and suffer the terror of nearly being burned alive as they try to escape.SHADES OF THE WALTON’S MEET DELIVERANCE!
author: Anita Dawes
